section.title: Query Test Editor
section.para: Query Test Editor is an editor used for adding or editing Query ID. You can check the result of the Query statement at Result View by executing test.

section.title: Opening Query Test Editor
section.para: You can open Query Test Editor through Query Explorer View.

section.title: Add Query Editor
section.para: You can add Query ID through Context Menu of the Mapping file.
For how to use, see Adding a Query.

section.title: Edit Query Editor
section.para: You can edit Query information through Context Menu of the Query ID.
For how to use, see Modifying a Query.
